channel.title: Easy FB Likes, Youtube, Twitter, and more!
channel.description:
[CENTER]I was trying to find more ways to get my FB page some more like and well I found this site: [URL=http://www.claimfans.com]Click here[/URL]
Pretty much you earn coins by liking FB pages, etc.. The more coins you add the more ads you can buy. For example, I made a fake FB just for liking pages to get coins. When you like certain pages you will get 8 coins and with those 8 coins you can use it to buy more ads for you. Here's a picture of mine.
[IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/ofjatp.png[/img]
CPC = How much a pay (coins) per person each time I get a new fan on FB.
I started out with 32 fans last night and now I have 72, so I think it works pretty good.
[size=14pt]Regular Link:[/size] [url=http://www.claimfans.com/][img]http://www.claimfans.com/promo/banner.png[/img][/url]
[size=14pt]Referral Link:[/size] [url=http://www.claimfans.com/ref.php?id=50236][img]http://www.claimfans.com/promo/banner.png[/img][/url][/CENTER]

item.title: Easy FB Likes, Youtube, Twitter, and more!
item.dc:creator: @Demo1 Demo_
item.description:
@Demo1 wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:9, topic:433881”][quote author=Demo_ link=topic=536598.msg3923664#msg3923664 date=1329969918]
Well it’s good for views, but the people don’t actually go to you’re channel/site
[/quote]

Well what the hell is the point? So you can feel good that everyone else thinks your popular on the internet, when you’re really not? Are people really that narcissistic?[/quote]

I don’t know if you’re talking to me or about this guy’s post. I just tested it out, not like I’m going to get any use of it.

Read full topic
